price: Wannan daga* lãbarun gaibi ne, Munã yin wahayinsa zuwa gare ka, kuma ba ka kasance a wurinsu ba a lõkacin da suke yin niyyar zartar da al'amarinsu, alhãli sunã yin mãkirci.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ مِنۡ أَنۢبَآءِ ٱلۡغَيۡبِ نُوحِيهِ إِلَيۡكَۖ وَمَا كُنتَ لَدَيۡهِمۡ إِذۡ أَجۡمَعُوٓاْ أَمۡرَهُمۡ وَهُمۡ يَمۡكُرُونَ
footnotes: * Ƙarfafãwa da ƙãrin tambĩhi daga abin da sũrar ta ƙunsa, daga nan har zuwa karshenta.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: dhālika min anbāi al-ghaybi nūḥīhi ilayka wamā kunta ladayhim idh ajmaʿū amrahum wahum yamkurūna
